{"id":787905520,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1661941808,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/787905520/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        int maxLength = 0;\n        unordered_map<char, int> lastOccurrence;\n        for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (lastOccurrence[s[i]] > 0) {\n                j = max(lastOccurrence[s[i]], j);\n            }\n            maxLength = max(maxLength, i - j + 1);\n            lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n        }\n        return maxLength;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
